mapper.sql: id, older_id, older_name, accidenttype_id, dutynurser_id, dutynurser_name, accident_time, accident_reason, inputuser_id, inputuser_name, input_time, cleared, note, send_flag

distinct
from pension_accident_record
order by ${orderByClause}

id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
older_id = #{record.olderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
older_name = #{record.olderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accidenttype_id = #{record.accidenttypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dutynurser_id = #{record.dutynurserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dutynurser_name = #{record.dutynurserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

inputuser_name = #{record.inputuserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
input_time = #{record.inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cleared = #{record.cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_flag = #{record.sendFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update pension_accident_record set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, older_id = #{record.olderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, older_name = #{record.olderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accidenttype_id = #{record.accidenttypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dutynurser_id = #{record.dutynurserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dutynurser_name = #{record.dutynurserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accident_time = #{record.accidentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, accident_reason = #{record.accidentReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inputuser_id = #{record.inputuserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inputuser_name = #{record.inputuserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, input_time = #{record.inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cleared = #{record.cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_flag = #{record.sendFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}

older_id = #{olderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
older_name = #{olderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accidenttype_id = #{accidenttypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dutynurser_id = #{dutynurserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dutynurser_name = #{dutynurserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update pension_accident_record set older_id = #{olderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, older_name = #{olderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accidenttype_id = #{accidenttypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dutynurser_id = #{dutynurserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dutynurser_name = #{dutynurserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accident_time = #{accidentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, accident_reason = #{accidentReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inputuser_id = #{inputuserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inputuser_name = #{inputuserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, input_time = #{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cleared = #{cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_flag = #{sendFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select * , IF(po.sex > 1,'女','男') as olderSex, po.age as olderAge, pda.accidenttype_name as accidentType from pension_accident_record par left join pension_older po on par.older_id = po.id left join pension_dic_accidenttype pda on par.accidenttype_id = pda.id where par.cleared = 2 and par.send_flag = 1
and unix_timestamp(par.accident_time) >=unix_timestamp(#{startDate})
and unix_timestamp(par.accident_time) <=unix_timestamp(#{endDate})
